title: Lifting the Lid on Visma-Lease a Bike’s Secret Winter Training
content:
I've spent countless hours combing through power files, Strava segments, podcasts, videos, and social media posts to learn how Visma-Lease a Bike trains.

Read the full article at Lifting the Lid on Visma-Lease a Bike’s Secret Winter Training on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
